title: Jedidiah
description: Jedidiah Houde had never stopped loving his wife. He has carried the spirit of her love with him for over a thousand years. He carries immense guilt for not being able to stop her death when he felt he should have. One night while out away from the compound, Jed looks up and what he sees brings all of his love back to him. What is most troubling, this woman or mate is not all that he thought she would be. There is something that calls to him but some things are not as they appear.Katherine Walker, a top-notch CPA at a local firm, is in danger. When she first sees Jed, she falls instantly in love. She can not believe how quickly she knows he is the one meant for her. However, there are forces beyond her control that will attempt to keep Katherine from being with Jed forever. Will they be able to overcome them?
author: D.F.  Wilson
